medium: Black chalk, heightened with white chalk
creditline: Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund and Fowler McCormick, Class of 1921, Fund
markings: Stamp in black, lower right: PM [in oval] [Lugt 3561]
inscribed:
in black and white chalk, lower left: En 16 de | Novre 1691 [corrected in brown ink to 1699]
in black ink, on verso of mount upper right center: AS
